name: parenthood
description: a way to organize relationships in plots via a simple text format (ppl). generates graphviz dot output.
author: Jos√© Pedro Dias <jose.pedro.dias@gmail.com>

scripts.run-sample-bin: bin/ppl2gv examples/parenthood.ppl public/graphviz/outputs/parenthood.gv && bin/ppl2gv examples/parenthood2.ppl public//graphviz/outputs/parenthood2.gv
scripts.run-sample-dot: dot public/graphviz/outputs/parenthood.gv -Tpng -opublic/graphviz/outputs/parenthood.gv.png && dot public/graphviz/outputs/parenthood.gv -Tsvg -opublic/graphviz/outputs/parenthood.gv.svg && dot public/graphviz/outputs/parenthood.gv -Tpdf -opublic/graphviz/outputs/parenthood.gv.pdf && dot public/graphviz/outputs/parenthood2.gv -Tpng -opublic/graphviz/outputs/parenthood2.gv.png && dot public/graphviz/outputs/parenthood2.gv -Tsvg -opublic/graphviz/outputs/parenthood2.gv.svg && dot public/graphviz/outputs/parenthood2.gv -Tpdf -opublic/graphviz/outputs/parenthood2.gv.pdf
